name: facebook/natural_reasoning
description: The NaturalReasoning dataset, released by Facebook, is a significant contribution to the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP). It consists of over 2.8 million reasoning questions, carefully curated from pretraining corpora DCLM and FineMath. The questions have been rigorously filtered to ensure they are challenging and free from duplicates or contamination from other benchmarks. This dataset is an invaluable resource for training and evaluating AI models' ability to perform complex reasoning tasks.
citeAs: @misc{yuan2025naturalreasoningreasoningwild28m,       title={NaturalReasoning: Reasoning in the Wild with 2.8M Challenging Questions},        author={Weizhe Yuan and Jane Yu and Song Jiang and Karthik Padthe and Yang Li and Dong Wang and Ilia Kulikov and Kyunghyun Cho and Yuandong Tian and Jason E Weston and Xian Li},       year={2025},       eprint={2502.13124},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL},       url={https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.13124},  }
creator: facebook
